overview: A sequel to The Treasure (Part 1) - Reality & Fantasy  (2017)  The movie resumes with the stories of Hatsheput in the Pharaonic era, Ali al-Zaibaq during the Ottoman era and Beshr al-Katatini, head of State Security Investigations Service, who faces new challenges in work and love, whilst pointing his son, Hassan, towards a treasure through his recorded will.
tagline: Al Kenz 2: Al Hobb Wa Al Maseer
title: The Treasure : Love & Destiny
